section.title: Introduction
section.p: Facebook is a social media platform that helps you connect with your friends and family. Post your thoughts and daily updates on Facebook to grow your audience. You can add people to your friends list, become a member of different groups, and follow pages. The application offers you various features to perform multiple actions from creating a post to selling products on Facebook marketplace. The privacy settings in Facebook provides you options to choose the audience for your posts.

section.title: Benefits
section.p: Apart from connecting you with friends and family, Facebook provides other benefits such as building communities, job search, candidate sourcing, and lead generation. If you are a business owner, the application helps you build your brand and grow your connections.
